txt.en: Faltharan is located at the shipyard.\n\nYou should speak with Faltharan.
Faltharan is located at the shipyard.\n\nYou should speak with Faltharan.
Faltharan is located at the shipyard.\n\nYou should accompany Faltharan as he says his good-byes.

'I wonder what will come of this.... Will people return to the city some day, or will they try to make new lives elsewhere? Many of us are too old to begin anew....\n\n'The guards seem to have everything in order. I think we can depart from here, [placeholder].'
Faltharan has asked you to accompany him as his family departs for more safe lands.

'Here we stand, [placeholder]. The sky grows bleak every day, but these ships represent symbols of hope for our city.

'I intend to have my mother and siblings aboard those ships before they depart, and will see to that matter personally. Like yourself, they have been valuable allies in maintaining the stability over the city as we played host.

'I only wish that some day the fighting will end, and we can return to rebuild this place.'
'Let us return to Tol Ciryarani, and discuss what is next.'
